text: The content structure of the rest of the module is on slide 3 we focus on what the charts don't show. Then we go to slide 4 and 6 which we describe the major benefits of price ladder information gathering and execution versus utilizing exclusively charts to make your intraday trading decisions. Then on slide 7 we have really probably my favorite drills exercise of the entire program and I want you to pay very close attention to this drill because this drill will help develop over a period of time your ability to understand all the intricacies and the dynamic parts of the price ladder and order flow patterns.
